stanza.line: Canst thou O cruel say I love thee notnot
When I against my self with thee partakepartake
Do I not think on thee when I forgotforgot
Am of my self all-tyrant for thy sakesake
Who hateth thee that I do call my friendfriend
On whom frown thou that I do fawn uponupon
Nay if thou lour on me do I not spendspend
Revenge upon my self with present moanmoan
What merit do I in my self respectrespect
That is so proud thy service to despisedespise
When all my best doth worship thy defectdefect
Commanded by the motion of thine eyeseyes
But love hate on for now I know thy mindmind
Those that can see thou lov and I am blindblind
